name: MATH 210
title: Manifolds III
description: The fundamental group, covering space theory and van Kampen's theorem (with a discussion of free and amalgamated products of groups), CW complexes, higher homotopy groups, cellular and singular cohomology, the Eilenberg-Steenrod axioms, computational tools including Mayer-Vietoris, cup products, Poincaré duality, the Lefschetz fixed point theorem, the exact homotopy sequence of a fibration and the Hurewicz isomorphism theorem, and remarks on characteristic classes.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): MATH 208 and MATH 209 recommended as preparation.  Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
